sentence.Network_en: His recitation was cadenced and rich in feeling.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的朗诵抑扬顿挫,富有感情.

sentence.Network_en: Whose voice, as cadenced as a silver streams.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的嗓音婉转如汩汩的银溪.

sentence.Network_en: The Passage is a measured , very collected , very elevated and very cadenced trot.
sentence.Network_cn: 正步是一种很有韵律, 极度收缩,四肢高抬,节奏明显的快步.

PerfectNetExp.abs: cadence 抑扬顿挫cadenced 音调整齐的cadency 有节奏的调子
油性马... ... hold a meeting 是什么意思坚守阵地,坚守岗位,坚持立场;处理日常事务 cadenced 韵律的;音调整齐的 cadi 下级法官.
at the lateral movements the pace should remain free and regular , maintaining a constant impulsion , yet it must be supple , cadenced and balanced .在侧方运动时，仍然要保持步伐自由与规律，始终保持前进气势，而且要柔韧灵活、富有节奏、平衡良好。
The canter , always with light , cadenced and regular strides , should be moved into without hesitation ., 跑步应当轻松 , 有节奏而且规律 , 运步毫不犹豫.
